properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 1500Z TO 1700Z DAILY
   18 AND 19 DEC IN AREA BOUND BY
      23-02.03S 043-51.03W, 23-02.00S 043-35.03W,
      23-04.03S 043-35.03W, 23-05.03S 043-51.03W.
2. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 1500Z TO 1700Z DAILY
   18 AND 19 DEC IN AREAS WITHIN 5.5 MILES OF:
      A. 23-04.03S 043-52.03W.
      B. 23-01.03S 043-47.33W.
      C. 23-05.03S 043-51.03W.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 191800Z DEC 17.
